sqlMap.sql: a.EXP_REQUEST_NO ,a.SHIPPER_CD ,a.DENSO_SHIPPER_TYP ,a.PLANT_CD ,a.REQUEST_ISSUER_COMP_CD ,a.REQUEST_ISSUER_DEPT_NM ,a.REQUEST_ISSUER_ID ,a.REQUEST_ISSUER_NM ,a.ISSUER_COMP_TEL ,a.ISSUER_COMP_NICE_NET ,a.INVOICE_CTGRY ,a.RE_EXP_GOODS_FLG ,a.IMP_INVOICE_NO_1 ,a.IMP_INVOICE_NO_2 ,a.ITEM_TYP ,a.DESCRIPTION ,a.ORIGIN_CNTRY_CD ,a.QTY_UNIT ,a.WEIGHT_UNIT ,a.CUSTOMER_SHIP_TO ,a.ACCOUNTEE_CD ,a.ACCOUNTEE_COMP_NM ,a.ACCOUNTEE_COMP_ADDR ,a.ACCOUNTEE_COMP_TEL ,a.CONTAINER_SORTING_KEY ,a.LOADING_CD ,a.CONSIGNEE_CD ,a.CONSIGNEE_COMP_NM ,a.CONSIGNEE_CNTRY_CD ,a.CONSIGNEE_COMP_ADDR ,a.CONSIGNEE_COMP_TEL ,a.SHIP_TO_CD ,a.SHIP_TO_COMP_NM ,a.SHIP_TO_CNTRY_CD ,a.SHIP_TO_COMP_ADDR ,a.SHIP_TO_COMP_TEL ,a.SHIP_TO_COMP_DEPT_NM ,a.SHIP_TO_ATTN_NM ,a.CURR_CD ,a.PRICE_TERMS ,a.PRICE_TERMS_1 ,a.PRICE_TERMS_2 ,a.TERMS_POINT ,a.TRADE_TERMS_1 ,a.PAY_METH ,a.PAY_TERMS ,a.TRADE_TERMS ,a.TRNS_CD ,a.STG_INSTR_FLG ,a.SPLIT_SHIPPING_NG_FLG ,a.DUE_DT ,a.REQUIRED_SHIP_DT ,a.PACKING_WH_CD ,a.PACKING_COMP_LOCATION_FLG ,a.PACKING_COMP_CD ,a.PACKING_COMP_DEPT_NM ,a.REQUEST_TO_PACKING_SEC ,a.CASEMARK_NOTATION ,a.FREIGHT_RESPONSIBLE_CD ,a.CTGRY_CD_1 ,a.BUDGET_NO_1 ,a.JOB_NO_1 ,a.PER_1 ,a.CTGRY_CD_2 ,a.BUDGET_NO_2 ,a.JOB_NO_2 ,a.PER_2 ,a.CTGRY_CD_3 ,a.BUDGET_NO_3 ,a.JOB_NO_3 ,a.PER_3 ,a.PREPARE_EXP_INVOICE_CTGRY ,a.SUPPLIER_INVOICE_NO ,a.CUSTOMER_CD ,a.CREATE_ORIGIN_TYP ,a.REQUEST_DT ,a.REQUEST_STATUS ,a.REQUEST_LAST_UPDATE_DT ,a.COM_UPDATE_FUNC_ID ,a.COM_UPDATE_USER_ID ,a.COM_UPDATE_TIMESTAMP ,a.COM_CREATE_FUNC_ID ,a.COM_CREATE_USER_ID ,a.COM_CREATE_TIMESTAMP ,s.USR_NM_EN as ISSUER_NAME ,u.USR_NM_EN as UPDATE_NAME ,row_number() over (order by a.REQUEST_STATUS ,a.SHIPPER_CD ,a.CONSIGNEE_CD ,a.SHIP_TO_CD ,a.TRNS_CD) ROW_NUM

d.EXP_REQUEST_NO ,(select COMP_NM_ABB from TM_NXS_COMP where COMP_CD = d.SHIPPER_CD) as SHIPPER_CD ,d.DENSO_SHIPPER_TYP ,d.PLANT_CD ,d.REQUEST_ISSUER_COMP_CD ,d.REQUEST_ISSUER_DEPT_NM ,d.REQUEST_ISSUER_ID ,d.REQUEST_ISSUER_NM ,d.ISSUER_COMP_TEL ,d.ISSUER_COMP_NICE_NET ,d.INVOICE_CTGRY ,d.RE_EXP_GOODS_FLG ,d.IMP_INVOICE_NO_1 ,d.IMP_INVOICE_NO_2 ,d.ITEM_TYP ,d.DESCRIPTION ,d.ORIGIN_CNTRY_CD ,d.QTY_UNIT ,d.WEIGHT_UNIT ,d.CUSTOMER_SHIP_TO ,d.ACCOUNTEE_CD ,d.ACCOUNTEE_COMP_NM ,d.ACCOUNTEE_COMP_ADDR ,d.ACCOUNTEE_COMP_TEL ,d.CONTAINER_SORTING_KEY ,d.LOADING_CD ,(select COMP_NM_ABB from TM_NXS_COMP where COMP_CD = d.CONSIGNEE_CD) as CONSIGNEE_CD ,d.CONSIGNEE_COMP_NM ,d.CONSIGNEE_CNTRY_CD ,d.CONSIGNEE_COMP_ADDR ,d.CONSIGNEE_COMP_TEL ,(select SHIP_TO_NM_ABB from TM_NXS_SHIP_TO where SHIP_TO_CD = d.SHIP_TO_CD) as SHIP_TO_CD ,d.SHIP_TO_COMP_NM ,d.SHIP_TO_CNTRY_CD ,d.SHIP_TO_COMP_ADDR ,d.SHIP_TO_COMP_TEL ,d.SHIP_TO_COMP_DEPT_NM ,d.SHIP_TO_ATTN_NM ,d.CURR_CD ,d.PRICE_TERMS ,d.PRICE_TERMS_1 ,d.PRICE_TERMS_2 ,d.TERMS_POINT ,d.TRADE_TERMS_1 ,d.PAY_METH ,d.PAY_TERMS ,d.TRADE_TERMS ,d.TRNS_CD ,d.STG_INSTR_FLG ,d.SPLIT_SHIPPING_NG_FLG ,d.DUE_DT ,d.REQUIRED_SHIP_DT ,d.PACKING_WH_CD ,d.PACKING_COMP_LOCATION_FLG ,d.PACKING_COMP_CD ,d.PACKING_COMP_DEPT_NM ,d.REQUEST_TO_PACKING_SEC ,d.CASEMARK_NOTATION ,d.FREIGHT_RESPONSIBLE_CD ,d.CTGRY_CD_1 ,d.BUDGET_NO_1 ,d.JOB_NO_1 ,d.PER_1 ,d.CTGRY_CD_2 ,d.BUDGET_NO_2 ,d.JOB_NO_2 ,d.PER_2 ,d.CTGRY_CD_3 ,d.BUDGET_NO_3 ,d.JOB_NO_3 ,d.PER_3 ,d.PREPARE_EXP_INVOICE_CTGRY ,d.SUPPLIER_INVOICE_NO ,d.CUSTOMER_CD ,d.CREATE_ORIGIN_TYP ,d.REQUEST_DT ,d.REQUEST_STATUS ,d.REQUEST_LAST_UPDATE_DT ,d.COM_UPDATE_FUNC_ID ,d.COM_UPDATE_USER_ID ,d.COM_UPDATE_TIMESTAMP ,d.COM_CREATE_FUNC_ID ,d.COM_CREATE_USER_ID ,d.COM_CREATE_TIMESTAMP ,d.ISSUER_NAME as ISSUER_NAME ,d.UPDATE_NAME as UPDATE_NAME

join (
union all
) b on a.EXP_REQUEST_NO = b.EXP_REQUEST_NO
b.ITEM_NO = #pltzItemNo#
b.DESCRIPTION = #itemDescription#
b.MAIN_MARK = #mainMark#

left join (
union all
) b on a.EXP_REQUEST_NO = b.EXP_REQUEST_NO
b.ITEM_NO = #pltzItemNo#
b.DESCRIPTION = #itemDescription#
b.MAIN_MARK = #mainMark#
left join TM_USER s on s.DSC_ID = a.COM_CREATE_USER_ID
left join TM_USER u on u.DSC_ID = a.COM_UPDATE_USER_ID
select d.EXP_REQUEST_NO, d.ITEM_NO, DESCRIPTION, '' as MAIN_MARK from TT_EXP_REQUEST_DTL d
select i.EXP_REQUEST_NO,'' as ITEM_NO, '' as DESCRIPTION, i.MAIN_MARK from TT_PLTZ_ITEM i

select distinct e.container_sorting_key from tm_exp_ship_to_shipping e
e.COMP_CD = #shipperCd#
e.SHIP_TO_CD = #shipToCd#

dynamic.isNotEmpty: A1.AUTH_PLNT >= '1' and a.SHIPPER_CD = A1.SHIPPER_CD and a.PLANT_CD = A1.PLANT_CD
A1.AUTH_PLNT >= '1' and a.SHIPPER_CD = A1.SHIPPER_CD and a.PLANT_CD = A1.PLANT_CD

sqlMap.select:
select count(rownum) from ( select distinct
from TT_EXP_REQUEST a
( select A1.SHIPPER_CD ,A1.PLANT_CD ,max( case
when A1.SHIPPER_CD = #userAuthList[].authMgtComp# and A1.PLANT_CD = #userAuthList[].procMfgDivCd# then #userAuthList[].authority#
else '0' end ) AUTH_PLNT from TT_EXP_REQUEST A1 where A1.PLANT_CD is not NULL group by A1.SHIPPER_CD ,A1.PLANT_CD ) A1
/* SqlMap-W1001ExpRequest.SearchCount */
)

update.dynamic:
/* SqlMap-W1001ExpRequest.Update */
SHIPPER_CD = #shipperCd#
DENSO_SHIPPER_TYP = #densoShipperTyp#
PLANT_CD = #plantCd#
REQUEST_ISSUER_COMP_CD = #requestIssuerCompCd#
REQUEST_ISSUER_DEPT_NM = #requestIssuerDeptNm#
REQUEST_ISSUER_ID = #requestIssuerId#

PRICE_TERMS_1 = #priceTerms1#
PRICE_TERMS_2 = #priceTerms2#
TERMS_POINT = #termsPoint#
TRADE_TERMS_1 = #tradeTerms1#

TRADE_TERMS = #tradeTerms#

sqlMap.select: select distinct EXP_REQUEST_NO, QTY_UNIT, sum(QTY) as QTY from TT_EXP_REQUEST_DTL where EXP_REQUEST_NO = #expRequestNo# group by EXP_REQUEST_NO, QTY_UNIT /* SqlMap-W1001ExpRequest.SearchQtyForDtl */

select distinct EXP_REQUEST_NO, CURR_CD, COMMERCIAL_FLG, sum(UNIT_PRICE) as UNIT_PRICE from TT_EXP_REQUEST_DTL where EXP_REQUEST_NO = #expRequestNo# group by EXP_REQUEST_NO, CURR_CD, COMMERCIAL_FLG /* SqlMap-W1001ExpRequest.SearchAmountForDtl */
